name: Palm Springs Bali Dive Resort
address: Jl. Tukad Abu, Tulamben, Kec. Kubu, Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali 80852, Indonesia
review 1:
Recently discovered this place and was pleasantly surprised.
Nice atmosphere of privacy, nature, style, delicious food, good massage and most importantly unforgettable view of the volcano!
It is a real delight. And be sure to see the sunrise if you are in this hotel.

All rooms are new and clean. I recommend 👍
Next time I will definitely take diving !
Thank you to the hosts for a great welcome 🙏
review 2:
Wonderful, quite and peaceful place. Second time here and definitely we will be back again 😊

This resort is real hidden gem!

Clean room and bathroom, minimalistic design with attention to details. You will get up in the morning with singing birds.. it’s just awesome 🥰

Nothing like this place around. Amazing place!
review 3: An unforgettable escape at Palm Springs Bali Dive Resort! From the moment we arrived, we were captivated by the resort's charm and the most incredible view of Mount Agung. Nestled amidst Bali's natural beauty, every corner of the resort offered a postcard-worthy panorama that took our breath away. Our spacious and meticulously appointed room provided a luxurious retreat and complete with modern amenities. Whether lounging by the pool, enjoying a meal at the on-site restaurant, or simply savoring the tranquility of our surroundings, every moment at Palm Springs was pure bliss. The attentive staff went above and beyond to ensure our stay was nothing short of perfection. We departed feeling refreshed, rejuvenated, and already dreaming of our next visit to Palm Springs Bali Dive Resort.
review 4:
Wonderful resort, perfect place to dive and chill and yoga while looking at Ocean and Volcano.

What a breathtaking view overlooking at the ocean and volcano! The pic I uploaded won’t justify the beautiful nature it is 😍😍😍

Loads of fun diving here. 10 fun dives with the PADI team! Will be back in September! Thank you to all the nice staffs here 🙏🏻🩷
review 5: The hotel is really beautiful with views of the Agung volcano and the sea. The staff are all very kind and always smiling. Melati is particularly helpful! By the way, I really love the breakfast provided; it tastes great!

name: The Palm Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
address: Palm Springs Bali, Jl. Tukad Abu, Tulamben, Kec. Kubu, Kabupaten Karangasem, Bali 80852, Indonesia
review 1: The food here is super delicious. Every morning we have the most amazing mash avocado and poached egg. Sumi asks asks us every day if we want fresh fish for dinner and boy they never disappoint. The staff goes above and beyond to cater all our needs. The best food in Bali for sure. And did I mention the views. Oh, come and see and try😋😋
review 2: An amazing place with a very beautiful view. On the one hand you have the Agung volcano, on the other the ocean, very pleasant staff , polite and helpful . I would especially like to mention a girl named Coman, she fulfilled all our wishes like a magic genie. Thanks to the owner for this place! It's like time has stopped here - it's amazing
review 3: The food at The Palm Restaurant is absolutely amazing! Every bite is bursting with incredible flavors. We had spaghetti carbonara, smashed avocado for breakfast and also we tried soto ayam, they’re so delicious!! The service is impeccable too. Highly recommend for a delightful dining experience!
review 4: The place is so quiet, just what we were looking for. Food was not bad at all, we had garlic prawn, nasi campur, some pasta and pumpkin soup. Big grassy area, view of the ocean and mount agung, swimming pool is there too. All good👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
review 5: Everything was top notch. Don’t have words to explain the tasty food

address: MHXX+486, Tulamben, Kubu, Karangasem Regency, Bali 80852, Indonesia
